name: PROXiE: A TCG Tabletop Simulator
description:
Proxie is way for you to play TCGs  or test out your own original games/formats online with your friends. Upload card faces from online image URLs with the deck editor, host or join a game with up to 3 of your friends and play in real time! 

Thanks for playing.

Join the Discord! https://discord.gg/BvHJysH

Online powered by the Unity Mirror asset: https://mirror-networking.com/
